name: Wickedoween
description:
A wicked witch has taken control of trick or treaters in Funkburbia! Pick your costumes and go defeat the evil witch and her minions!

This game was developed for the DSOP Trick or Treat jam. Ran out of time so a couple things aren't yet implemented. Hopefully there are not too many bugs but there probably are! LOL

Assets used:
Lot's of Synty Assets, check them out here! : https://syntystore.com/
